edu.kit.scc.dem.wapsrv.model.formats

Class ContentTypeParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.kit.scc.dem.wapsrv.model.formats.ContentTypeParser

  • public class ContentTypeParser
extends java.lang.Object
    The ContentTypeParser processes content type string as they are used in Accept and Content-Type HTTP Headers. The class recognizes the format, extracts eventually existent Q-Values (see HTTP content negotiation) and instantiates a Formatter object to process specific details of the format string, if any exist.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Matthias Dressel, Michael Hitzker, Markus Hoefler, Andreas Loeffler, Timo Schmidt

      • getQValue

        public double getQValue()
        Returns the HTTP Content Negotiation Q value provided by the client. If none was provided, DEFAULT_Q_VALUE is returned
        Returns:
        The Q valued
